page.title: 12Events.School Garden Fete.
page.content: During the last part of the Summer Term,the school opens its gardens to the villagers,for its annual garden fete.The purpose of the fete is to raise money for the School funds.In recent years, the money raised, has helped the school to buy a computer and extra sporting equipment. After the opening ceremony,children, parents and friends,flood into the school garden to buy cakes,produce,try their luck on the tombola stall,rumage through the jumble or take a dip into the ever popular bran tub. There are numerous stalls to test the imagination of the visitors,such as guess the name of the doll or what is inside the mystery parcel? When all the money has been spent, the visitors are invited to sit down for a nice cup of tea.
